annotation_sentence: Um, not really. I thinking to do something, but not sure yet.

annotation_sentence: Ah yes, I hear about nice place... um, how to say... they have good, uh, spicy food.

annotation_sentence: Yes, yes, that the one! I think it called... um, Red Chili or something like that.

annotation_sentence: I hear about new action film. Everyone say it very good.
